context.p: By default, you can use a filter, blur your background, or use a default or custom image or video to obscure your surroundings. Depending on your organization's requirements, you can disable the virtual background feature by modifying the applicable file.
To restrict all users from using virtual backgrounds during a meeting, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Modify the configuration file. The default value is TRUE.

ul.li: For Docker, update the value of the ENABLE_VIRTUAL_BACKGROUND parameter:ENABLE_VIRTUAL_BACKGROUND=false
For Kubernetes, update the value of the VirtualBackgroundEnabled parameter:virtualBackgroundEnabled: false

step.cmd: Restart the Sametime server to apply the changes. For more information, refer to Starting and stopping servers.
